info.description:
This API will return a collection of Service Inventory Data Location.

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/v1/service`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Service Inventory

tags.name: Storage
tags.description: A collection of Storage Areas for a Location

get.description:
Returns a Hierarchal collection of Inventory Storage Areas for a specific location
![This endpoint is in development](/themes/portal/images/statuspngs/statusdev.png)

200.description: All Inventory Storage Areas for a specific Location

get.summary: Inventory Items for a specific Location
get.description:
Returns a collection of Inventory Item data for a specific location
![This endpoint is in development](/themes/portal/images/statuspngs/statusdev.png)

200.description: List all Inventory Items information for a location

put.summary: Update an Inventory Item for a specific Location
put.description:
Allows updates to an Inventory Item for a specific Location
![This endpoint is in development](/themes/portal/images/statuspngs/statusdev.png)

requestBody.description: Details for the Item that is being updated

message.description: Status Message for the Update Request

inventoryItemIdParam.name: inventory_item_id
inventoryItemIdParam.description: ID of the Inventory Item to be udpated

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP Header variable will route to the Integration environment.  Only applicable in QA Server.

apikey.name: apikey
apikey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify security

inner_pack_size.description: Inner Pack Size for the Item

fiscal_time_period_id.description: Fiscal Period ID in which the Item is being updated

sort_order.description: Sort Order of the Storage Area
Sort Order of the Storage Area
Sort Order of the Storage Area

inventory_item_storage_area_name.description: Name of the Storage Area for the Item

inventory_item_storage_area_id.description: ID of the Storage Area for the Item

purchase_size_description.description: Description of the Purchase Size of the Item Pack

purchase_size.description: Purchase Size of the Item Pack

pack_size_description.description: Description of the Pack Size of the Item

inner_pack_size_description.description: Description of the Inner Pack Size of the Item

inner_pack_size.description: Inner Pack Size of the Item

unit_purchase_description.description: Description of the Purchase Unit of the Item

beginning_units.description: Number of Beginning Units of the Item

received_units.description: Number of Received Units of the Item

catch_weight_flag.description: Flag to indicate whether or not catch weight is applicable for this Item

transfer_in_quantity.description: Number of Units Transferred In for the Item

transfer_out_quantity.description: Number of Units Transferred Out for the Item

fiscal_time_period_id.description: ID of the Fiscal Period for the Item
